name: Hamster Club-i
overview: Hamster Club-I is the first game released in the Playstation game console based on the popular hamster club characters of the games released in the Gameboy and Gameboy Advance consoles. The game is a collection of mini games that features 3 hamsters to choose one for playing and other 15 unlockables hamsters. At the beginning of the game there are 5 different mini games to play. The game also features a simulation story mode in which the player can select one of 5 possible characters (one 1 is avaliable at the beginning of the game) and can train his hamster or buy him new things (items or even a new house) to make him happier. After some weeks the hamster will compete in hamster tournaments that are played as the mini games. Includes an iMode cable.
